alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Knox; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 5:47PM CDT until May 12 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Archer County in northern Texas... East central Knox County in northern Texas... South central Wilbarger County in northern Texas... Northwestern Baylor County in northern Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 547 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Seymour, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Seymour, Red Springs, Dundee, Lake Kemp, Mabelle, and Lake Diversion. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
